snippet: The Yankees retire numbers with gusto, 18 to date and three more soon, but this zest also limits options when it comes to assigning numbers to current players.
abstract: New acquisitions by New York Yankees are often forced to surrender their favorite jersey numbers in light of fact that team has retired 18 to date and is set to retire three more; zest for commemorating numbers of retired stars has created an availability crunch for team, with some speculating that they will eventually be forced to move into the triple digits.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees retire numbers with gusto, 18 to date and three more soon, but this zest also limits options when it comes to assigning numbers to current players.

headline.seo: Yankees, Eager to Retire Numbers, Subtract Options for Current Players
headline.main: 2=Jeter, 3=Ruth, 4=Gehrig. ... In the Bronx, Numbers Are Finite.
